articles.description: Paparazzi hounded Kanye and his family Sunday ... to the point that it forced his hand.
articles.content:
Kanye West and his family wanted to touch base with the man upstairs this weekend -- but it appears they were interrupted by the paparazzi ... which set Papa Bear off.
The rapper-producer was headin… [+1410 chars]
